entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-28
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EnC: Warning reported when updating entry point shouldn't be reported for async Main #75286

Closed

  • EnC: Changing the type of an expression around an active foreach statement should be a rude edit #3627
    Backlog
  • EnC: Changing the type of a locked expression should be a rude edit #72240
  • EnC: Report warning when Main method is updated #73472
    17.11

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve doc comments for `IConditionalOperation.IsRef` #75288
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Use common helper method #75287
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Support long chains of `else if` statements #74317
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reapply "Load analyzers and generators in isolated ALCs in our OOP process" #75233
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Enable support for an LSP client to open source generated files #75180
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Change rename command handler's behavior #75229
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Suppress an assert when an indexer is declared, but DefaultMemberAttribute is missing. #75099
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
